name: Advanced JavaScript Techniques
description: Master advanced JavaScript concepts including closures, promises, and async/await.

syllabus.content: In-depth exploration of closures and their practical applications.
Learn how to handle asynchronous operations using promises.

name: Full-Stack Web Development with MERN
description: Learn how to build full-stack web applications using MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js.
prerequisites: Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

syllabus.content: Overview of the MERN stack and setting up the development environment.

syllabus.topic: Building a RESTful API with Node.js and Express
syllabus.content: Learn how to create and test a RESTful API.

name: UX/UI Design Fundamentals
description: An introduction to UX/UI design principles and tools, focusing on creating user-friendly interfaces.

syllabus.content: Basics of UX design and how to conduct user research.
Learn about color theory, typography, and visual hierarchy.

name: Data Science with Python
description: Learn data analysis, visualization, and machine learning using Python.

syllabus.content: Overview of data science and setting up Python for data analysis.
Learn how to create visualizations using Matplotlib.

name: Introduction to Machine Learning
description: A beginner-friendly course on machine learning concepts and algorithms.

syllabus.content: Introduction to machine learning and types of algorithms.
Exploring supervised learning algorithms like linear regression.

name: Building REST APIs with Node.js
description: Learn how to create scalable REST APIs using Node.js and Express.

syllabus.content: Understanding REST principles and setting up a Node.js project.
Learn how to define routes and controllers in Express.

name: Mastering CSS Flexbox and Grid
description: Become proficient in CSS Flexbox and Grid to build responsive layouts.
prerequisites: Basic knowledge of HTML and CSS

syllabus.content: Understanding Flexbox layout model and how to use it for responsive design.
Learn advanced Flexbox properties and use cases.

name: React Hooks in Depth
description: Dive deep into React Hooks and learn how to manage state and side effects in functional components.

syllabus.content: Understanding the basics of React Hooks and how they replace class components.
Learn how to manage state and side effects using useState and useEffect.
